name: Angel Falls
description: The highest waterfall in the world, located in the heart of Venezuela's rainforest.

name: Mochima National Park
description: A marine and coastal paradise known for turquoise waters and coral reefs.

name: Colonia Tovar
description: A picturesque German-style town with rich culture, crafts, and cool weather.

name: Morrocoy National Park
description: Famous for its white sand beaches, cays, and mangroves.

name: Pico Bolívar
description: Venezuela's highest mountain, accessible via the Mérida cable car.

name: Puerto La Cruz Commercial Port
description: A major commercial hub and beach resort on the Caribbean coast.

name: La Casona Cultural Center
description: A historic presidential residence now turned into a cultural exhibition space.

name: Parque del Este (Sucre Park)
description: A lush urban park perfect for families, jogging, and relaxing.
